sentences.english: They explained, We want to show our son what he missed by not coming to West Point.
sentences.chinese: 我們想讓兒子知道他沒來西點軍校錯過了什麼。

sentences.english: As cadets, you volunteered for service during this time of danger.
sentences.chinese: 作爲軍校學生，你們在此危險時期志願爲國家服務。

sentences.english: Her boyfriend is a cadet of West Point.
sentences.chinese: 她的男朋友是西點軍校的一名軍校生。

sentences.english: Her boyfriend is a cadet of West Point.
sentences.chinese: 她的男朋友是西點軍校的一名軍校生。
軍校把三名學員除了名。

sentences.english: West Point and Volongze Military Academy are two of them.
sentences.chinese: 西點軍校和伏龍芝軍事學院就是其中的兩所。

sentences.english: Marketing, the growth of the Chinese people Whampoa Military Academy.
sentences.chinese: 中國營銷人成長的黃埔軍校。

sentences.english: In 1842, Jackson enrolled at the U.S. Military Academy at West Point.
sentences.chinese: 1842年，傑克遜進入西點軍校美國陸軍軍官學校。

sentences.english: But cadets can choose from almost fifty areas of study.
sentences.chinese: 但是軍校生可以從五十個研究的區域中選擇。

sentences.english: He attended a military academy for highschool and never graduated from college.
sentences.chinese: 高中上的是軍校，大學沒有畢業。

sentences.english: Objective Discussion on cadet nasal bone fracture in simple effective diagnosis method.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討軍校學員鼻骨骨折的簡便有效診治方法。

sentences.english: Of course, I got kicked out.
sentences.chinese: 當然，我被軍校踢了出來。

sentences.english: Whampoa and its alumni were the base on which Chiang’s power was built.
sentences.chinese: 黃埔軍校以及其校友是蔣介石賴以建立其權力的基石。

sentences.english: I hope he can attend military school and become a soldier, so he can make a contribution to society when he grows up.
sentences.chinese: 我希望他進軍校，當軍人，長大後爲社會做貢獻。

sentences.english: Was it harder to be a woman at West Point?
sentences.chinese: 在西點軍校生存對女性而言難不難？

sentences.english: Argyll County Military Academy Honorary Colonel Clive?
sentences.chinese: 阿蓋爾郡軍校的名譽上校克萊夫？
